alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Lexington, southwestern Sumter and central Orangeburg Counties through 745 AM EST... At 659 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orangeburg County Airport, or near Orangeburg, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, St. Matthews, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Cameron, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Fort Motte, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall, Edisto and Creston. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 129 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
